text: was a Japanese director, screenwriter and editor. He was born in Onomichi, Hiroshima, Japan. He was best known as the director of the 1977 horror movie House. His other best movies are Toki o Kakeru Sh≈çjo and Hanagatami. Obayashi died on April 10, 2020 in Tokyo of lung cancer at the age of 82. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:Japanese movie directors Category:Japanese screenwriters Category:Editors
title: Nobuhiko Obayashi
